About Me

Goal-oriented, Motivated and Endless learner

Jiwon Han

There have been many transitions in my life so far and it's still ongoing! I lived in Korea and came to Seattle in 2016. I majored in Communication in college and have read many people's thoughts. I was an Administrative assistant for a mobile company and I was motivated to enter an IT field. I am currently embarking on a software engineering career. I always try my best to experience and learn new things every moment and every place I am in.

LegUp

Full Stack Developer
2020.06 - Current

Supported CTO by fixing bugs and creating full-stack logics for product's features. Tech stacks are NodeJs, React, Postgres, AWS.

Epicodus

Full Stack development certificate
2020.01 - 2020.06

Studied various technologies, mainly Javascript, C#, React, and database. I learned how the application is developed from end to end.

Samsung Electronics

Executive Assistant
2017.05 - 2019.05

Supported the R&D team and worked closely with engineering teams so that they focus on business more efficiently. I participated in two R&D development projects. I did research on future products and completed user scenarios.
